item.description:
... at Seanote on Nantasket Beach (http://www.seanote.co...)


with ENTRAIN



Wow Labor Day will be here and gone and it won't be long before the ice curtain falls on 2007. Seanote is only minutes from Boston but has the beach thing down and if you don't move to this rhythm section you need to check your pulse ;)

Plan is to hook up for some fried clams or a lobsta salad and a cocktail at Ocean Club http://www.oceanclubd... at 7:30p or 8:00p then head over to Seanote which is walking distance (.5 mi or 1 minute by car).

Sunset should be around 7:10pm for those who can make it to Ocean Club by that time.



A little bit of planning to coordinate dinner arrangements will be required but otherwise this should be a fun & casual event.

Enjoy Labor Day weekend and hope to see you at this event!
item.name: Summer-stretch beach boogie
